devdoc.details: Smart contract for seed phases of liquid launch.

params._fundingAmount: The amount of funding tokens to contribute.

params._funder: Address of funder to find the maximum claim

params._claimAmount: The amount of seed token a users wants to claim.
params._funder: Address of funder to calculate seconds and amount claimable

close().details: Shut down contributions (buying). Supersedes the normal logic that eventually shuts down buying anyway. Also shuts down the admin's ability to alter the whitelist.

feeClaimed().details: Amount of seed tokens claimed as fee

params._funder: address of funder to check fee claimed
address of funder to check fee

params._admin: The address of the admin of this contract. Funds contract and has permissions to whitelist users, pause and close contract.
params._endTime: Distribution end time in unix timecode.
params._fee: Success fee expressed as a % (e.g. 10**18 = 100% fee, toWei('1') = 100%)
params._permissionedSeed: Set to true if only whitelisted adresses are allowed to participate.
params._price: price of a SeedToken, expressed in fundingTokens, with precision of 10**18
params._softHardThresholds: Array containing two params: - the minimum funding token collection threshold in wei denomination. - the highest possible funding token amount to be raised in wei denomination.
params._startTime: Distribution start time in unix timecode.
params._tokens: Array containing two params: - The address of the seed token being distributed.                                 - The address of the funding token being exchanged for seed token.

retrieveSeedTokens(address).details: retrieve remaining seed tokens back to project.

params._funder: address of funder to seed amount

params.buyer: Address which needs to be unwhitelisted

params._metadata: Seed contract metadata, that is IPFS Hash

params._buyer: Address which needs to be whitelisted

params._buyers: Array of addresses to whitelist addresses in batch

devdoc.title: PrimeDAO Seed contract
